ygData.subject: Hydras and Optimus
ygData.msgSnippet: Hydras landed as he saw Optimus waking up. Fire  surronded his eyes. Prime...youve had a bumpy ride I see...to bad i wasnt the one to give you that little

Hydras landed as he saw Optimus waking up. Fire  surronded his 
eyes. "Prime...youve had a bumpy ride I see...to bad i wasnt the one to give 
you that little face lift." His spark burned in hatred for him. He was the 
ultinate thorn in his side. Galvatron had killed him once and he would again 
if he proved to be his foe one last time. "What do u want Prime?"
> Nightlight/Elita::
>

> while the baby looked couriosly at the bots.

> > > > > > > > Optimus Prime:
> > > > > > > > 
> > > > > > > >  
> > > > > > > > 
> > > > > > > >              In his protoform body, Optimus Prime 
> glided 
> > > his 
> > > > > > stolen ship easily 
> > > > > > > > through the void of temporal space. He was heading to 
> > Earth 
> > > > to 
> > > > > > visit some 
> > > > > > > > friends. Not knowing what he would find when he got 
> > there, 
> > > > he 
> > > > > > decided he would 
> > > > > > > > need a suitable vehicle mode. He found one in the 
> ships 
> > > > > > databanks. A 
> > > > > > > > Cybertronian tanker, complete with the ability to lift 
> > off.
> > > > > > > > 
> > > > > > > >             As he cleared Temp Space he started the 
> scan 
> > of 
> > > > the 
> > > > > > truck, every 
> > > > > > > > little detail. Then downloaded the information into 
> > > himself. 
> > > > He 
> > > > > > got up from his 
> > > > > > > > chair, built for the old Autobots and Decpticons, and 
> > went 
> > > > to 
> > > > > > prepare. As he 
> > > > > > > > incorporated the designs into himself he thought of 
> all 
> > the 
> > > > > > people on this 
> > > > > > > > planet. He was ready.
> > > > > > > > 
> > > > > > > >             He touched his chest, the change to actual 
> > bot 
> > > > had 
> > > > > > hurt his combined 
> > > > > > > > Spark. Prime was shocked as he entered the atmosphere.
> > > > > > > > 
> > > > > > > >             In the deep Prime voice that had once 
> > declared 
> > > > to 
> > > > > > Megatron that "one 
> > > > > > > > shall stand; one shall fall" he boomed, "Magnus would 
> > dare 
> > > > > > betray me like that?" 
> > > > > > > > He didn't even sit down as he entered the atmosphere, 
> > the 
> > > > ship 
> > > > > > shook. He was 
> > > > > > > > searching for the bomb that he knew Magnus had planted 
> > on 
> > > > the 
> > > > > > ship. "Oh, crap."
> > > > > > > > 
> > > > > > > >             The ship's thrusters exploded, but the 
> rest 
> > of 
> > > > the 
> > > > > > ship didn't. 
> > > > > > > > Instead, it careened out of control and slammed into 
> the 
> > > > > ground, 
> > > > > > throwing Prime 
> > > > > > > > out of the hatch. He slid across the ground as his 
> ship 
> > > > stopped.
> > > > > > > > 
> > > > > > > >             When he stopped and got up he checked 
> > himself 
> > > > over. 
> > > > > > He was in full 
> > > > > > > > operation, just his good looks were damaged. He walked 
> > back 
> > > > to 
> > > > > > the ship to look. 
> > > > > > > > He was in bad shape, his face had been ripped apart, 
> and 
> > > the 
> > > > > > visor over his 
> > > > > > > > ocular systems. Now everyone could see the protoform 
> > > > > underneath, 
> > > > > > the red eye 
> > > > > > > > that turned and looked. His faceplate was smashed and 
> > > > dented, 
> > > > > > and his 
> > > > > > > > "windshield" chest was broken, so one could see the 
> > > shoulder 
> > > > > > joints on the > inside. All in all he looked like some 
> sort 
> > of 
> > > > > robot 
> > > > > > sent back from the future, 
> > > > > > > > to change the future. His arm was a bit ripped up too, 
> > but 
> > > > he 
> > > > > > could live with 
> > > > > > > > that.
> > > > > > > > 
> > > > > > > >             Luckily for him, the communications boxes 
> on 
> > > > these 
> > > > > > pods were nearly 
> > > > > > > > indestructible. He would need it to talk to the other 
> > bots. 
> > > > > > First though was 
> > > > > > > > Rodimus and Hydra.
> > > > > > > > 
> > > > > > > >             "Rodimus Prime," he started, with 
> > disgust, "and 
> > > > the 
> > > > > > one known as 
> > > > > > > > Hydra. I have a message for you. Magnus is dead. He 
> was 
> > > > killed 
> > > > > > trying to stop 
> > > > > > > > me. But he was unsuccessful. I am requesting a meeting 
> > with 
> > > > > both 
> > > > > > of you, at 
> > > > > > > > these coordinates. [Punches in coordinates] Know that 
> if 
> > > you 
> > > > > > decide to betray my 
> > > > > > > > trust and come with soldiers, I will kill all of you. 
> I 
> > > will 
> > > > > > know�"
> > > > > > > > 
> > > > > > > >             With that he cut off the transmission and 
> > > > waited, 
> > > > > > checking over his 
> > > > > > > > guns�.
